description: Harper is one of Lana little sisters. Harper and Sarah are twin sisters. She lives in the Alola region within walking distance of the Pok√©mon School. Ash visited their home one day after school and she thought that he might be Lana`s boyfriend but was then quickly interested in Pikachu. After a few moments of fooling around with Pikachu, it got annoyed and Thunderbolted everyone in the house. She can often be identified by the Slowpoke graphic on her shirt.
name: Ho
